channel.title: Wolf Scaper 317
channel.description:
Well, I have been working on a private server for a while with my brother...
We have made lots of progress for a small 317 server made from Delta base.
Well, this server has:
Full dueling - staking and options working. All monsters added where they are supposed to be. Full barrows. Can hold more than 300 players. File size is only 366kb. A new reality show called survivor, many places and games. Members. Over 100 customs. First Anti-Dupe system that actually works. Economy reset, reset's the item ID that you enter Full PVP with following Freezing monsters with them not walking Guilds Less lag No more getting hit at log in Added class's to grab fight pits loader, stops monster glitching
Client side
Over 100 customs. Almost all 508 monsters added -- members only New animations such as new magic attacks, Trying too make them work A lot of 508 objects added. Fixed client so it saves character at log in and log out -- prevents nulls and account resetting. Thinking of adding trade limit. Added about 20 new custom interfaces.
Currently working on:
Making a file that grabs monster drops off of www.runeHq.com this way it perfects monster drops, haven't figured out how I'm going to make it drop the correct number of items and the chances.
Add a new Guild handler this way you can't no-clip into guilds.
Stop monsters from walking through objects and players from walking through objects.
Many people are mad cause there are dupers, I made an anti-dupe tutorial, it was never posted, so here's the video.
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-Cyr3niTKA[/flash]
Here are some pictures of the server, including custom items.
Custom model, Full Business Person, changed in V2 [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/fancy.jpg[/img] Fight pits, enabled range and other attack styles! [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert10.jpg[/img] Dueling with staking! [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert11.jpg[/img] Some homer area with shops [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert12.jpg[/img] Mage god guild shop [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert13.jpg[/img] Guild members showing their guild [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert14.jpg[/img] Range guild shop [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert15.jpg[/img] Skiller guilds shop [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert16.jpg[/img] Quests, added more [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert17.jpg[/img] Max level is now 133, and max exp is 377m, but this is an older picture [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert18.jpg[/img] Melee guild doesn't have guild area, so they get 2X drop rate [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert19.jpg[/img] Strip club! [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert20.jpg[/img] Getting kicked for killing strippers [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert21.jpg[/img] Getting bear for killing Transfestites [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert22.jpg[/img] Walking drunk emote [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert23.jpg[/img] Battle dungeon after game [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert3.jpg[/img] Battle dungeon rewards [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert4.jpg[/img] Pest control rewards [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert5.jpg[/img] Attacking portals [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert7.jpg[/img] Npc's spawning from portals [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert8.jpg[/img] After Pest Control [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert9.jpg[/img] Battle Dungeon waiting room [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert1.jpg[/img] Battle Dungeon, the battle [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert2.jpg[/img] Pest control entering [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/adverts/advert6.jpg[/img] Many players online for a small guild meeting [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/dawnof50players.jpg[/img] Back of full Business person [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/back.jpg[/img] Wolf Scaper Fancy Pker's in Full business person, changed in V2 [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/fancy.jpg[/img] Wolf Scaper in full Business person [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/fancy3.jpg[/img] 4 in full business person [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/fancy4.jpg[/img] From of full business person [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/front.jpg[/img] cupofnoodles in full business person [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/noodlesishawt.jpg[/img] side of full business person [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/side.jpg[/img] sterling13 in full fancy [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/wolfsfancy.jpg[/img]
These are guides on RCING made by me... [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing12.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing13.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing14.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing15.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing16.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing9.jpg[/img]
New stats update
[IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo139/wolf_scaper/guides/guides%202/rcing17.jpg[/img]
Well, I hope you enjoyed my brothers server...
He might release it, maybe not, there are a lot of other things in the server, so I will update this on a weekly basis
enjoy!
Wolf Scaper 317

item.title: Wolf Scaper 317
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

icebabe11:

Doesn’t matter… He should upload the entire thing instead of you… [POST YOUR OWN DAMN CREATIONS!]

I might be blind but i don’t see in these section rules that someone can’t post their brothers Server if their brother gives them permission. I know this is meant for Your server development but people still have a right to post their brothers server.

Read full topic

item.title: Wolf Scaper 317
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Well, I have been working on a private server for a while with my brother…

We have made lots of progress for a small 317 server made from Delta base.

Well, this server has:

Full dueling - staking and options working.
All monsters added where they are supposed to be.
Full barrows.
Can hold more than 300 players.
File size is only 366kb.
A new reality show called survivor, many places and games.
Members.
Over 100 customs.
First Anti-Dupe system that actually works.
Economy reset, reset’s the item ID that you enter
Full PVP with following
Freezing monsters with them not walking
Guilds
Less lag
No more getting hit at log in
Added class’s to grab fight pits loader, stops monster glitching

Client side

Over 100 customs.
Almost all 508 monsters added – members only
New animations such as new magic attacks, Trying too make them work
A lot of 508 objects added.
Fixed client so it saves character at log in and log out – prevents nulls and account resetting.
Thinking of adding trade limit.
Added about 20 new custom interfaces.

Currently working on:

Making a file that grabs monster drops off of www.runeHq.com this way it perfects monster drops, haven’t figured out how I’m going to make it drop the correct number of items and the chances.

Add a new Guild handler this way you can’t no-clip into guilds.

Stop monsters from walking through objects and players from walking through objects.

Many people are mad cause there are dupers, I made an anti-dupe tutorial, it was never posted, so here’s the video.

[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-Cyr3niTKA[/flash]

Here are some pictures of the server, including custom items.

Custom model, Full Business Person, changed in V2

Fight pits, enabled range and other attack styles!

Dueling with staking!

Some homer area with shops

Mage god guild shop

Guild members showing their guild

Range guild shop

Skiller guilds shop

Quests, added more

Max level is now 133, and max exp is 377m, but this is an older picture

Melee guild doesn’t have guild area, so they get 2X drop rate

Strip club!

Getting kicked for killing strippers

Getting bear for killing Transfestites

Walking drunk emote

Battle dungeon after game

Battle dungeon rewards

Pest control rewards

Attacking portals

Npc’s spawning from portals

After Pest Control

Battle Dungeon waiting room

Battle Dungeon, the battle

Pest control entering

Many players online for a small guild meeting

Back of full Business person

back.jpg768×527

Wolf Scaper Fancy Pker’s in Full business person, changed in V2
fancy.jpg797×564

Wolf Scaper in full Business person

4 in full business person

From of full business person
front.jpg763×523

cupofnoodles in full business person

side of full business person
side.jpg769×529

sterling13 in full fancy

These are guides on RCING made by me…















New stats update

Well, I hope you enjoyed my brothers server…

He might release it, maybe not, there are a lot of other things in the server, so I will update this on a weekly basis

enjoy!

Wolf Scaper 317

Read full topic
